name: Psycho Boost
description: You send an extremely powerful wave of psychic energy at creatures in a 60 foot cone. Creatures in the wave must make a WIS save against your Move DC, taking 5d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The power of the move exhausts you, and your next attack is done at disadvantage. If your next attack requires a creature saving throw, they have advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.

effect.name: A very appealing move, but after using this move, the user is more easily startled.
effect.effect: Pokemon has disadvantage on all CHA Saving Throws for the remainder of the Appeal Rounds.
